titleStmt.title: Yny lhyvyr hwnn y traethir. Gwyðor kymraeg. Kalandyr. Ygredo, ney bynkeu yr ffyð gatholig. Y pader, ney weði yr aglwyð. Y deng air deðyf. Saith kinweð yr egglwys. Y kampey arber[--]wy ar Gwyðieu gochbladwy ae keingeu.
titleStmt.author: Price, John, Sir, 1502?-1573.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: t.p. damaged, with loss of print.
Signatures: A-B⁸ (? irregularly marked, t.p. unmarked).
